document_data.title: The Keeper of Secrets
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Keeper of Secrets"''' is a short story by [[Ed Greenwood]] included in the 2004 anthology ''[[Realms of the Dragons]]''.
document_data.Summary: In [[Waterdeep]], [[Mirt]] the Moneylender and [[Durnan]] the Wanderer go to collect debts from a mysterious "Keeper of Secrets" and encounter a cryptic woman named [[Taraunramorlamurla]].
